thread.title: Associate Athletic Director - Revenue Enhancement - College Sports
thread.title_full: Associate Athletic Director - Revenue Enhancement - College Sports

title: Associate Athletic Director - Revenue Enhancement - College Sports
text: Posted/Updated: 10-14-2015 Brief Job Description: Developing and implementing a vital and comprehensive revenue generation program integrating fund raising, marketing, corporate sponsorship, ticket sales, multi-media rights, and licensing.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
